pages.text: 23|105|Nandao wo de jixiang meiyou dui nimen xuanduguo, er nimen fouren ta ma?
23|106|Tamen shuo: Women de zhu a! Women de boming, ceng zhifu women, er women bian cheng mi wu zhe.
23|107|Women de zhu a! Qiu ni rang women cong huo yu li chuqu, ruguo women zaici fanzui, women jiu que shi bu yi zhe.”
23|108|Ta shuo: Nimen zai huo yu zhong yingdang renqitunsheng, buyao dui wo shuohua.
23|109|Congqian, wo de puren zhong you yipai ren chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women yi xindaole, qiu ni raoshu women, qiu ni lianmin women, ni shi zui lianmin de.”
23|110|Dan nimen yi tamen wei xiaobing, changchang chixiao tamen, zhidao tamen shi nimen wangle jinian wo.
23|111|Jintian wo que yi wei tamen de jianren er baochou tamen, tamen zheng shi chenggong de.
23|112|Zhu shuo: Nimen zai da dishang douliule ji nian?
23|113|Tamen shuo: Women douliule yitian, huozhe buzu yitian; qing ni wen wen neng jisuan nian yue de (tianshi) ba.
23|114|Ta shuo:“Nimen zhi douliule hen shao de nian yue, jiaruo nimen zhidao.”
23|115|Nandao nimen yiwei wo zhishi turan di chuangzaole nimen, er nimen bu bei zhao gui wo ma?
23|116|Zun zai an la——zhenshi de junzhu. Chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta shi gaogui de baozuo zhi zhu.
23|117|Fan zai qidao an la de tongshi qidao bie de wuji de shenling zhe, ta jiang zai zhu nali shoudao qingsuan, bu xindao zhe bi bu chenggong.
23|118|Ni shuo: Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni raoshu, qiu ni lianmin, ni shi zui lianmin de.
